result.longName: Beijing Jingwei Hirain Technologies Co., Inc.

assetProfile.address2: 5~10 Floor No.7 Zhichun Road Haidian District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Beijing Jingwei Hirain Technologies Co., Inc. engages in research, development, production, and sale of automotive electronic products and services in China. It offers chassis and safety systems, such as adaptive front-lighting control systems, LED ADB control systems, electric power steering systems, forward active safety cameras, active grille shutters, and automatic headlight leveling systems; sensors, such as hall effect angle position, kick, brake pedal angle, steering angle, rain and light, and chassis height sensors; and body and comfort products, including vehicle on-board wireless chargers, sunroof control units, power lift-gates/tail-gates, electrical steering column control units, ambient light systems, central gateway modules, over head consoles, body electric systems, door control modules DC-DC converters, passive entry and push start products, seat control modules, and body control modules. The company also provides telematics systems comprising RAMS and control base systems; and powertrain systems, such as vehicle control units/hybrid control units for new energy vehicles, diesel exhaust post-processing controllers, vehicle control units, and electric parking brake systems. In addition, it offers controllers, integrated electronics, and signal processing and semi-physical simulations; system design tools; and mobility solutions consulting and training services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
